summary: Completed testing of new V2Ray Bot features: Category CRUD operations, unlimited plan features (duration/traffic), and theme toggle functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend has theme toggle visibility issues but core functionality is implemented.

ui_bugs.issue: Theme toggle button not visible/clickable in some states

integration_issues.issue: Modal overlay intercepting clicks, preventing form submissions

passed_tests: Category CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Plans with fully unlimited features (both null)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix theme toggle button visibility issues and modal overlay interception problems. The theme toggle button exists but has visibility/clickability issues in certain states.
